content.div:
Most people's love of finger paints disappears somewhere around kindergarten, but Lil Wayne isn't most people. His new video,"Mirror (ft. Bruno Mars)," just landed, and it's safe to say that we wouldn't want to be his housekeeper.

Weezy blasts a giant, empty canvas with cans of paint while crooning the rap-ballad. Chorus-singing Mars also gets his hands dirty, sitting on the top rung of a paint-soaked ladder.

Despite all the paint-hurling, it turns out Lil Wayne's artistic inspiration is less Pollock, more Da Vinci. The video ends by revealing his creation, which turns out to be a depiction of Weezy posing as Jesus on a cross.

Watch the clip below:

source.title: Watch: Lil Wayne's New Video "Mirror (ft. Bruno Mars)
source.subtitle: Weezy blasts a giant, empty canvas with cans of paint while crooning the rap-ballad in his latest clip.

entry.title: Listen: Justin Bieber Debuts New Song 'Be Alright' in Toronto

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber performed a new song called "Be Alright" during his Dec. 21 concert at Toronto's Massey Hall.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber in concert at Toronto's Massey Hall, Dec. 21, 2011. The show was taped for a MuchMusic special, Justin Bieber: Home for the Holidays, premiering Thursday, Dec.22 at 6 p.m. ET/PT on MuchMusic and 7:30 p.m. ET/PT on CTV.
link.title: Justin Bieber

link.Abstract: It's a Nov. 23 miracle! Justin Bieber performed a concert of festive hits for The Today Show. Check out pictures of our favourite Christmas Elf and his special helper, Usher.
link.title: Photos: Justin Bieber Brings a Little Christmas to The Today Show

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber says his mom "always told me there wasn't a Santa."
link.title: The Saddest Christmas Story Ever: Santa Claus Never Visited Justin Bieber

link.Abstract: Drake invited Justin Bieber to join him on "Trust Issues" during a concert this weekend in L.A. Watch the video.
link.title: Video: Drake and Justin Bieber Perform 'Trust Issues' in L.A., Reveal New Collaboration

link.Abstract: A second Justin Bieber's "Santa Claus is Coming to Town" has arrived. Watch it here -- if only to puzzle over why the kid plays a cyborg, steampunk elf.
link.title: Justin Bieber Debuts (Another) Video For 'Santa Claus Is Coming to Town'

link.Abstract: Watch Justin Bieber and Mariah Carey in their new video, "All I Want For Christmas Is You." Fair warning: Just like any other Xmas gift, you can't give this one back.
link.title: Video: Justin Bieber and Mariah Carey Debut 'All I Want For Christmas,' The Gift That Keeps On Giving You Nightmares

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber frolics with the characters from Santa Claus in Comin' to Town in his latest video. Watch it here.
link.title: Justin Bieber More Elfin Than Usual in New 'Santa Claus is Coming to Town' Video

link.Abstract: Christmas has come early to Beliebers. Watch "Mistletoe."
link.title: Video: Justin Bieber's 'Mistletoe'

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber recruited Boyz II Men for his latest Christmas video, "Fa La La." Watch it here.
link.title: Video: Justin Bieber and Boyz II Men Have a Very '90s Christmas

link.Abstract: How do you hold a moonbeam in your hand? You can't! And yet, Justin Bieber tries and tries and tries again. We've rounded up photos of the pop star's signature move -- the '90s boy-band air grab. Swoon!
link.title: Gallery: Justin Bieber's Signature Move

link.Abstract: MuchMusic scored a holiday miracle when it convinced Stratford, Ont.’s Justin Bieber to come home for the holidays. It scored another when it managed to book Toronto’s historic Massey Hall — one of the city’s best-sounding venues known for classic live albums by Neil Young and Rush — for the special event.
link.title: TV Tonight: Justin Bieber - Home for the Holidays

link.Abstract: Despite reports, Drake did not fire his management team at Hip Hop Since 1978
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Drake at the 53rd annual Grammy Awards
link.title: Drake

link.Abstract: Despite his newest album debuting at number one on the Billboard charts last week, The Toronto-bred rapper fired his American management team.
link.title: Drake Tells Management Team To Take Care

link.Abstract: Drake loves sweaters, but does he know how to "Take Care" of them? We've rounded up sweater-care tips that should make the Toronto MC proud.
link.title: Take Care of Your Sweaters -- With Drake!

link.Abstract: Florence + The Machine covered Drake's "Take Care" during an appearance at BBC 1's Live Lounge. Hear it here.
link.title: Video: Florence + The Machine Take On Drake's 'Take Care'

entry.title: Kanye West, Adele Lead Grammy Nominations

link.Abstract: The Grammy nominations were announced Wednesday, and Kanye West leads the pack. Find out who else is up for a Grammy February 12.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: The Grammy nominations were announced Wednesday, and Kanye West leads the pack. Find out who else is up for a Grammy February 12.
link.title: Kanye West

link.Abstract: Consider it a sample of what you can expect on Grammy night, Feb. 12, 2012. The Grammy Nominations Concert took place Nov. 30, 2011 at L.A.'s Nokia Theatre. We've got photos from the event.
link.title: Photos: Inside the Grammy Nominations Concert

link.Abstract: From Taylor Swift's big win to Justin Bieber in Zubaz pants, we're looking back at the most memorable moments of the evening.
link.title: Best and Worst Moments from the AMAs

link.Abstract: Montreal was watching Kanye West and Jay-Z Nov. 22 when the two MCs brought their Watch the Throne tour to the Bell Centre. We've got photos. The Watch the Throne tour continues to Vancouver Dec. 17 and 18.
link.title: Photos: Watch The Throne in Montreal

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift's Speak Now World Tour is at its end. The country-pop star gave the first of two sold-out shows at New York's Madison Square Garden Nov. 21. We've got photos.
link.title: Photos: Taylor Swift at Madison Square Garden

link.Abstract: Selena Gomez! Lady Gaga! Coldplay! A dancing leprechaun! (Oops! That was actually Justin Bieber!) We've got pictures from the 2011 MTV Europe Music Awards, held Nov. 6 in Belfast, Ireland.
link.title: Photos: Inside the 2011 MTV Europe Music Awards

link.Abstract: Lady Gaga vows to channel her inner "Indian hippie" at a press conference in New Delhi.
link.title: Gallery: Lady Gaga in India

link.Abstract: Nicki Minaj is more than just a pretty face. She's also an angry face, a bonkers face ... we could go on. Here are some of the best examples from the MC's new video for "Till the World Ends."
link.title: Gallery: The Many Faces of Nicki Minaj

link.Abstract: Nip-slips, a turkey dinner and more nip-slips. That's how you celebrate Pink Friday! Nicki Minaj's Friday, Aug. 5 performance on Good Morning America was packed with surprises.
link.title: Photos: Nicki Minaj Does Good Morning America

link.Abstract: What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas...but we managed to smuggle out these photos. See pics of Nicki Minaj at the I Heart Radio music festival Sept. 24.
link.title: Photos: Nicki Minaj Plays I Heart Radio Fest

link.Abstract: Lady Gaga made out with Sting, did pilates on a motorcycle/keyboard and danced in her underwear. What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas...but we managed to smuggle out these photos. See pics of Gaga's Sept. 24 set at the I Heart Radio music festival.
link.title: Photos: Lady Gaga Plays I Heart Radio Fest

entry.title: Jay-Z, Diddy, Kanye West Top Forbes List of Richest Rappers

link.Abstract: Jay-Z and Kanye West have earned their thrones. The rappers rank high on Forbes' annual list of the highest-earning names in hip-hop.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: FUR PILLOWS FOR EVERYONE! Jay-Z has topped Forbes' list of the highest-earning hip-hop stars for the fourth time in five years.
link.title: Jay-Z

link.Abstract: Jay-Z, Diddy and Kanye West are the highest-paid rappers of the last year. Who else made way more than you between May 2010 to May 2011? And who's the first woman to ever be dubbed a Forbes "Cash King?" Check out our gallery.
link.title: Gallery: Forbes' Cash Kings of Hip-Hop for 2011

link.Abstract: Leonardo DiCaprio is this year's highest-earning Hollywood actor, according to Forbes magazine.
link.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Makes More Money Than You (and All of Hollywood)

link.Abstract: Angelina Jolie and Sarah Jessica Parker are tied for the top spot on Forbes' annual list of the top-earning actresses in showbiz. They both made $30 million in the last year. See who else scored a list-worthy pay day.
link.title: Gallery: Forbes Names Hollywood's Highest-Paid Actresses

link.Abstract: Images of some of the world's top-earning supermodels, according to Forbes.com.
link.title: Photos: Top-Earning Supermodels

link.Abstract: Oprah gave up the No. 1 spot for the third time in seven years, while Justin Bieber debuted on the Celebrity 100 list in the No. 3 spot.
link.title: Lady Gaga Beats Oprah on Forbes' Celebrity 100; List No Longer One of Oprah's Favourite Things

link.Abstract: Listen up! We've got reviews of new music from Jay-Z and Kanye West, Nick Carter, The Deep Dark Woods, Fountains of Wayne and The Horrors.
link.title: Album Reviews (Jay-Z and Kanye West, Nick Carter, The Horrors and More)

link.Abstract: A hot, steaming pile of celebrity gossip, updated daily!
link.title: Blog: Scandal Sheet

link.Abstract: We track down celebs to find out what they do when they're not on set or walking the red carpet.
link.title: Star Stalker

link.title: Follow Dose.ca on Twitter
